amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in House Report 105-184, expressing that it is the sense of Congress that all member nations of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization should contribute their proportionate share to pay for the costs of the Partnership for Peace program and for any future costs attributable to the expansion of NATO.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 425 - 0 (Roll no. 361).
